paper_abstract: Recently, electronic auctions have been receiving more and more attention in the world of electronic commerce. The security and efficiency of electronic auctions are becoming important. We shall propose a securely sealed-bid auction scheme that uses our group signature scheme with the function of authenticated encryption. It can achieve the following goals: secrecy of bidding price, anonymity, verifiability, non-repudiation, and better performance.
paper_title: A secure e-auction scheme based on group signatures
